title: 3 and Out - Dan Campbell's Elite QB Comments, Tiger/Masters Reaction
itunes:title: 3 and Out - Dan Campbell's Elite QB Comments, Tiger/Masters Reaction
description:
John discusses Lions HC Dan Campbell's comments that teams don't need an elite QB for sustained NFL success, and explains why he was so impressed with Tiger's Masters comeback despite him not contending, and why he can't take anymore Nick Faldo as an analyst.

Follow John and The Volume on Twitter, Instagram and YouTube for the latest content and updates and check out FanDuel for the best wagering and daily fantasy action!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
